item.title: IA and ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:

The post IA and ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
IA and ONE merchandise is available at Lammtarra and Mulan stores right now as part of the IA & ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018!

The merchandise on offer includes the recently announced goods which use IA’s latest ‘Yukata version’ design, including a tapestry, acrylic stands, can badges, keyrings, T-shirts and clear files!

Some of these goods were previously available at Comiket 94 but will only be available from the Lammtarra and Mulan stores and the Hachimaki shop from this point.

There is also a Limited Edition ‘IA Yukata version’ fan available at the stores, which will be given as a gift to those who purchase IA or ONE goods from participating stores during the campaign.

Please note that only 1 fan shall be given to each customer and there are a limited number so get one before they are gone!

You can get a closer look at both the front and back designs of the fan below.

Summer Fair Product Lineup

For a full list of the products available and the prices of each item, see the list below.

Lammtarra and Moulin Store Pre-sale:

  • IA Yukata version B2 Tapestry ¥ 3,000 (approx. $27 USD)
  • IA / 01 version Acrylic Figure ¥ 1,800 (approx. $16 USD)
  • IA Guitar version Acrylic Figure ¥ 1,800 (approx. $16 USD)
  • ONE Guitar version Acrylic Figure ¥ 1,800 (approx. $16 USD)
  • IA Yukata version Acrylic Figure ¥ 1,800 (approx. $16 USD)

New IA and ONE merchandise:

  • IA & ONE glitter Can Badge (3 piece set) ¥ 700 (approx. $6 USD)
  • IA & ONE Yukata version A4 Clear File (chibi version) ¥ 300 (approx. $3 USD)
  • IA Yukata version A4 clear file ¥ 300 (approx. $3 USD)
  • IA Yukata version large Acrylic Keyring ¥ 2,000 (approx. $18 USD)
  • IA Yukata version Acrylic Keyring (chibi version) ¥ 500 (approx. $4 USD)
  • IA Yukata version T-shirt (Available in sizes M, L and XL) ¥ 3,500 (approx. $31 USD)
  • IA HIGHER T-shirt (Available in sizes M, L and XL) ¥ 3,500 (approx. $31 USD)
  • ONE Yukata version Acrylic Keyring (chibi version) ¥ 500 (approx. $4 USD)

Campaign Period

The IA & ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018 started on Friday 10th of August and will run until Sunday 2nd of September, 2018.

Participating Stores

The IA & ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018 event will be held at the following 8 stores in Japan:

  • Lammtarra Epixis Akiba shop
  • Lammtarra Media World shop
  • Lammtarra Akiba shop
  • Mulan Central Street shop
  • Mulan Akiba shop
  • Mulan Shinjuku Nishiguchi shop
  • Mulan Yokohama Nishiguchi shop
  • Mulan Akabane shop

Source

1st Place Official News Blog

The post IA and ONE x Lammtarra Mulan Summer Fair 2018 appeared first on VNN.
